title: WHERE IS THE SWITCH 2?!
description:
FOLLOW US ON EVERYWHERE!

transcript_chunks.text: analysts say that the Nintendo switch 2 announcement is now unlikely before the end of 2024 we just have to continue to sit and wait and hope and kind of guess when we'll see it but I think it would be unwise business-wise to announce the switch to right ahead of the holidays you are still going to catch people buying the switch here this holiday season they're going to buy games for the switch and then you announce the switch to of course the switch sales are going down because it's been eight years but you still will get stragglers there's no question we know every holiday season there are parents out there around the globe that will buy consoles
